title: Industrial - Semi-skilled 7.1 (Americas)
description:
Our Industrial â€“ Semi-skilled 7.1 solution is designed for entry-level positions and measures the behaviors and experiences that underlie successful and safe performance for production workers. The solution assesses behaviors and competencies foundational to industrial roles including: following policies and procedures; applying relevant trade skills; wearing required protective equipment; working with or monitoring equipment; producing high quality work; effectively working with others; and maintaining an orderly work environment. Potential job titles that use this solution include: Production and Assembly Worker, Construction Worker, Extraction Technician.
Please note this package is in Americas norm.
